DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal of this study is to test whether an electronic pelvic floor questionnaire (e-PAQ-PF) will increase discussion rates of incontinence in a primary care setting.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Women's Health by Using an Electronic Pelvic Floor Questionnaire
DOC.criteria: Woman Aged 40 and older Scheduled for a well visit at the Women's Health Internal Medicine West Clinic Unable to speak English Unable to fill out questionnaire Excluded by patient's clinician prior to recruitment
